(2 Socket)

 Weapon
Gloves
 7% Chance To Cast Level 5 Lower Resist On Striking

8% Life stolen per hit
8% Mana stolen per hit
+8 to Maximum Damage

Regenerate Mana 40%
Replenish Life +24
+16% Faster Run/Walk
